title: Police responds to social media video of cop supports protesters
body_lines: Responding to widespread video that bore witness to a policeman too joining the protesting public to extend his suppot in Kottawa, the Police said it was not yet proven that whether the person wearing the khaki attire similar to police uniform in the video was a policeman.
During the protest, a man in a khaki dress, wearing a black jacket and a white helmet, addressed a crowd that "we are with you, even though we are in uniform."
Police said an investigation is underway to ascertain whether he was a real policeman or belonged to any other service or an ordinary man. (Darshana Sanjeewa Balasuriya)
